page.title: 16Water Sports, Pevensey Bay.
page.content: On the beach at Pevensey Bay near the Eastbourne boundary there is a dingy {sailing}club and a school.The club was in the centre of the village on the site that is now St Wilfrid's Church. Pevensy Bay{water sports centre}has run for 6 years.The Bay has become a popular venue for{windsurfing.}The centre is open at weekends in winter for enthusiasts. From June to September it is open all the time.It provides{windsurfing,canoeing and {dingy sailing.}To hire anything costs Â£3.00 an hour.Beginner and intermediate courses are held.At weekends up to sixty boards may be out at sea at a time.{The Aqua club}in the centre of the Bay is a base for{sea {angling and water skiing.}Members hold International trophies and records.
